values: 关心；关怀；照料；照顾；保养；护理；照看；看护；用心；细心；小心；谨慎；注意；慎重考虑；忧虑；焦虑；担忧；挂念；顾虑；引起烦恼的事；令人焦虑的事
关心；关怀；关注；在乎；重视；在意；介意；照顾；照料；护理；看护
（CARE）美国援外合作署（Cooperative for American Relief Everywhere的缩写）；起因和排除故障（Cause And Removal Error的缩写）；关闭与重组执行（Closure and Realignment Execution的缩写）

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 粗心的；无忧无虑的；淡漠的
有同情心的；表示或感到关怀或关心的
粗心地；不注意地；无忧无虑地

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指对某事感到关切、操心或忧虑，主要用于否定句或疑问句。
通常用于否定句、疑问句或条件句中。也可用在答复询问的肯定句中。指因某事打扰、感到不满而表示反对。
通常指因悲哀、焦虑或忧愁等所困扰的心理状态。
多指极强烈的关心和忧虑。常带纯客观的意味。
语气比worry强，多指沉思、沮丧或忧郁。
普通用词，着重使人焦虑、烦恼或深深不安。
指对预料中的不祥之事的焦虑。
作“关心”用时，是indifference(冷漠)的反义词，侧重对他人健康、安全等的关心，也可暗示对困难、危险或失败等的忧虑。
强调因出于责任感或顾虑等而产生的不安。
侧重对未知事态演变的忧虑。

word_group.brief_definition: 在乎, 关心, 在意
照顾, 照料, 护理
医疗护理；医疗照顾；医疗保健
保重, 照顾好自己(多用于告别）
个人护理产品；个人护理用品；个人护肤品
特别护理中心；监护室；重症监护室
医疗卫生工作者；卫生保健工作者；医疗保健人员
(常用于无礼地表示)不在乎, 不在意

bilingual.source: Thank you so much for taking care of me.
Ali takes care of the new born animals.
The young should take care of the old.
bilingual.target: 年轻人应该照顾老年人。

bilingual.source: Helping to care for a sick family member.
bilingual.target: 帮助照顾生病的家庭成员。

bilingual.source: You have to take care of this to stay alive.
bilingual.target: 你必须照顾这个才能活下去。

list.abstract: Care，英语单词，作动词和名词，意思有关心，在意；小心，照料。
阳杰，ID：Care，《英雄联盟》电竞选手，现效力于FPX电子竞技俱乐部，司职中单。 2024年1月19日，FPX官宣2024lpl春季赛大名单：阳杰担任中单。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm satisfied with my care.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我满意你的照顾。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you satisfied with your care?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你对我的照顾满意么？

yingyinNormal.en: You know you can't take care of him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道你照顾不了他的。

yingyinNormal.en: You will care for it, you will teach it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要照顾它，训练它。

yingyinNormal.en: But I'm supposed to take care of you guys.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可我应该照顾你们的。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb》

yingyinNormal.en: Well then, I'm satisfied with my care.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那好吧，我很满意你的照顾。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa, you really must take more care of Teddy. Teddy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇，你也应该好好照顾你的泰迪！泰迪。

yingyinNormal.en: Darling, Daddy's taking care of his two favorite girls.
yingyinNormal.zh: 亲爱的，爸爸正在照顾着他最爱的两个姑娘。

yingyinNormal.en: I also took care of my little sister. I pretty much took care of her from the time she was born until she was in high school.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我还照顾过我的妹妹，基本上都是我在照顾她，从她出生到上高中。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, so what do I need to know to take care of her?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，我该怎么照顾她。

yingyinNormal.en: And there was no one there to take care of you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 当时没有人在那里照顾你么？

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, so, have fun and take very good care of them, okay?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，玩得开心，照顾好他们，好吗？

yingyinNormal.en: And his girlfriend Jeanne Hebuterne was there taking care of him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他的女朋友珍妮·赫布特尼在那里照顾着他。

yingyinNormal.en: I am your father, okay? And I have been busting my ass to take care of you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是你父亲，我尽心尽力的在照顾你。

yingyinNormal.en: I can not deactivate until you say: You are satisfied with your care.
yingyinNormal.zh: 直到你说你满意我的照顾，我才可以结束工作。

yingyinNormal.en: I can not deactivate until you say: You are satisfied with your care.
yingyinNormal.zh: 直到你说：我很满意你的照顾，我才会结束工作。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm almost 16, godmother. I can take care of myself. I understand.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我已经16岁了，教母，我可以自己照顾自己。我知道。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, you guys go. We'll take care of her. You have nothing to worry about.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们走吧。我们会照顾她的。你们什么都别担心。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, I don't know. Remember what happened when I took care of your goldfish?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不知道，还记得以前我是怎么照顾你的金鱼的吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Mom did. Mom always took care of everything. Mom was a mess, Missy was a dumb teenager. I had to look after both of 'em.
yingyinNormal.zh: 妈妈啊。妈总是照顾好了一切。妈妈当时魂不守舍，米希是个中二少女。只能我来一肩挑起照顾她们的责任。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 在意; 担忧; 忧虑

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 关心他人的
adv. 仔细地；小心地
adj. 小心的；谨慎的；深思熟虑的；审慎的；焦虑的；忧虑的；关切的；挂念的
adj. 无忧无虑的；没有责任的
n. 私人看护

word_family.mean: n. 照顾；照料；看护；关怀；密切关注；审慎思考；担心；忧虑；收养；监护

examination_example.sentence: On the one hand, it's a necessary condition for many worthwhile things: child <highlight>care</highlight>, friendships, etc.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一方面，它是许多有价值的事情的必要条件：照顾孩子、交朋友等等。

examination_example.sentence: Lower-income jobs like gardening or day <highlight>care</highlight> don't appeal to robots.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 像园艺或日托这样的低收入工作对机器人没有吸引力。

examination_example.sentence: Crop pickers, violinists, construction workers, entrepreneurs, engineers, home health-<highlight>care</highlight> aides and physicists are among today's birds of passage.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 农作物采摘者、小提琴手、建筑工人、企业家、工程师、家庭保健助手和物理学家都属于如今的“候鸟”。

sense_info_list.zh: 在意; 担忧; 忧虑

examination_example.sentence: Before you share your thoughts, think about what the powerful person <highlight>cares</highlight> about.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在你分享你的想法之前，想想那些有权有势的人在乎什么。

examination_example.sentence: DeSombre isn't saying people should stop <highlight>caring</highlight> about the environment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: DeSombre并不是说人们应该停止关心环境。

examination_example.sentence: Now we can understand each other's positions and recognize our shared values, since we both <highlight>care</highlight> about needy workers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在我们可以理解彼此的立场，并认识到我们共同的价值观，因为我们都关心贫困的工人。

examination_example.sentence: Though all the subjects were drawn from a population of European extraction, <highlight>care</highlight> was taken to see that all subjects were taken from the same population.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管所有的研究对象都来自欧洲血统的人群，但还是要小心确保所有的研究对象都来自同一人群。

examination_example.sentence: Reading becomes the default state from which you temporarily surface to take <highlight>care</highlight> of business, before dropping back down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阅读成了默认状态，你可以临时出现，处理一下业务，再继续沉浸其中。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 粗心地；粗心大意地；无忧无虑地
adj. 不小心的；粗心的；无忧无虑的；满不在乎的；随意的；草率的；敷衍的；不感兴趣的；不做努力的
adv. 仔细地；小心地
adj. 小心的；谨慎的；深思熟虑的；审慎的；焦虑的；忧虑的；关切的；挂念的
adj. 无忧无虑的；没有责任的
adj. 关心他人的

word_family.mean: n. 照顾；照料；看护；关怀；密切关注；审慎思考；担心；忧虑；收养；监护

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 特别护理中心；监护室；重症监护室

examination_example.sentence: She was asked if she was prepared for what might be a daunting task <highlight>caring</highlight> for her.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她被问及是否准备好承担照顾她的艰巨任务。

examination_example.sentence: They enjoy a higher life expectancy, presumably reflecting advantages with respect to health <highlight>care</highlight>, diet, lifestyle, and the like.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的预期寿命较高，反映其在保健、饮食、生活方式等方面的优势。

examination_example.sentence: Ease of <highlight>care</highlight> was most important; summer dresses and outfits, in particular, were chiefly cotton, readily capable of being washed and pressed at home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 易于护理是最重要的; 特别是夏天的裙子和套装都主要是棉布制成的，很容易在家里洗和熨。

examination_example.sentence: It has made them <highlight>care</highlight> more about what they say.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这让他们更加在意自己所说的话。

examination_example.sentence: In a survey of 54 of the world's leading brands, almost all of them reported that consumers are showing increasing <highlight>care</highlight> about sustainable lifestyles.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有研究对54个世界领先品牌进行了调查，几乎所有品牌都表示越来越多的消费者开始追求可持续的生活方式。

examination_example.sentence: Surveys on consumers in the U.S. and the U. K. show that they also <highlight>care</highlight> about minimizing energy use and reducing waste.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对美国和英国消费者的调查显示，他们也关注能源消耗最小化，以及减少浪费。

examination_example.sentence: These fears are mostly exaggerated: as with hysteria about genetic modification, we humans are generally wise enough to manage these problems with speed and <highlight>care</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些担忧大多被夸大了: 就像对基因改造的歇斯底里一样，我们人类通常足够聪明，能够迅速而谨慎地处理这些问题。

word_usage.usage:
“关心某人”应说care about sb.，不可遗漏介词about。
示例：有些人对别人漠不关心。
误 Some people do not care others.
正 Some people do not care about others.

care表示“计较”“介意”“在乎”，而care for则表示“照顾”，“喜欢”。
示例：I don't care for black coffee.
我不喜欢黑咖啡

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指对预料中的不祥之事的焦虑。
强调因出于责任感或顾虑等而产生的不安。
作"关心"用时, 是 indifference(冷漠)的反义词, 侧重对他人健康、安全等的关心, 也可暗示对困难、危险或失败等的忧虑。
语气比 worry 强, 多指沉思、沮丧或忧郁。
多指极强烈的关心和忧虑。常带纯客观的意味。
通常指因悲哀、焦虑或忧愁等所困扰的心理状态。
指对某事感到关切、操心或忧虑, 主要用于否定句或疑问句。
通常用于否定句、疑问句或条件句中。也可用在答复询问的肯定句中。指因某事打扰、感到不满而表示反对。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 关怀; 照顾; 照料

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 不小心的；粗心的；无忧无虑的；满不在乎的；随意的；草率的；敷衍的；不感兴趣的；不做努力的
adv. 仔细地；小心地
adj. 小心的；谨慎的；深思熟虑的；审慎的；焦虑的；忧虑的；关切的；挂念的
adj. 无忧无虑的；没有责任的
adj. 关心他人的

word_family.mean: n. 照顾；照料；看护；关怀；密切关注；审慎思考；担心；忧虑；收养；监护

sense_info_list.zh: 关怀; 照顾; 照料

examination_example.sentence: Gender norms and social expectations about caregiving many make it more difficult for men to provide <highlight>care</highlight> to sick spouses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 性别规范以及对于关怀照护的社会期望可能使男性更难为生病的配偶提供照顾。

examination_example.sentence: Given the increasing concern about health <highlight>care</highlight> costs for the aging population, Karraker believes policymakers should be aware of the relationship between disease and risk of divorce.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 鉴于老龄化人口的医疗保健费用日益令人忧虑，Karraker 认为政策制定者应当重视疾病与离婚风险之间的关联。

examination_example.sentence: Sick ex-wives may need additional <highlight>care</highlight> and services to prevent worsening health and increased health costs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 生病的前妻可能需要额外的护理和服务，以防止健康状况恶化和医疗成本增加。

examination_example.sentence: The patients were split into three groups: one group received only usual <highlight>care</highlight> from a physician while the other two groups received usual <highlight>care</highlight> from a physician plus one of two computerized CBT programs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 患者被分成三组：一组只接受医生的常规治疗，另外两组除常规治疗外，还分别需要接受两项线上认知行为疗法中的一项。

examination_example.sentence: The study looked at computer-assisted cognitive (认知的) behavioral therapy (CBT) and found that it was no more effective in treating depression than the usual <highlight>care</highlight> patients receive from a primary <highlight>care</highlight> doctor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对计算机辅助认知行为疗法研究后发现，与主治医生提供的常规护理相比，该疗法在治疗抑郁症方面效果并不显著。

examination_example.sentence: Medical institutions across the state are starting to make a philosophical switch to becoming a health organization, not just a health <highlight>care</highlight> organization.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不仅仅是医疗保健组织，全国各地的医疗机构都在开始进行理念上的转换。

examination_example.sentence: They will <highlight>care</highlight> less about their own background.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们不会太在意自己的背景。

examination_example.sentence: Those assumptions lead us to the perception that people in poverty are lazy, they don't <highlight>care</highlight>, and they haven't made the right decisions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些假设让我们认为穷人很懒，他们不在乎，他们没有做出正确的决定。

examination_example.sentence: Ron Lieber advises that allowances be used as a means of showing children how to save, give, and spend on things they <highlight>care</highlight> about.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Ron Liber建议将零用钱用作向孩子们展示如何储蓄、给予和花在他们关心的事物上的一种方式。

examination_example.sentence: A legislative staffer dismissed the activist's concerns, telling her "my husband took <highlight>care</highlight> of that—I stayed home."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一名立法人员打消这位活动人士的顾虑，告诉她“我丈夫处理了这件事——我呆在家里。”

examination_example.sentence: She would like to have everything taken <highlight>care</highlight> of.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她想把一切都处理好。

examination_example.sentence: Spending time alone also allows you to more efficiently take <highlight>care</highlight> of problems.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 独处也能让你更有效地处理问题。

examination_example.sentence: I would urge drivers to take extra <highlight>care</highlight> on the roads for their journeys.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我会敦促司机在旅途中格外小心。

word_usage.usage:
“关心某人”应说care about sb.，不可遗漏介词about。
示例：有些人对别人漠不关心。
误 Some people do not care others.
正 Some people do not care about others.

care表示“计较”“介意”“在乎”，而care for则表示“照顾”，“喜欢”。
示例：I don't care for black coffee.
我不喜欢黑咖啡

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指对预料中的不祥之事的焦虑。
强调因出于责任感或顾虑等而产生的不安。
作"关心"用时，是 indifference(冷漠)的反义词，侧重对他人健康、安全等的关心，也可暗示对困难、危险或失败等的忧虑。
指对某事感到关切、操心或忧虑，主要用于否定句或疑问句。
通常用于否定句、疑问句或条件句中。也可用在答复询问的肯定句中。指因某事打扰、感到不满而表示反对。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 医疗护理；医疗照顾；医疗保健
保重；照顾好自己(多用于告别)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 不小心的；粗心的；无忧无虑的；满不在乎的；随意的；草率的；敷衍的；不感兴趣的；不做努力的
adj. 无忧无虑的；没有责任的
adv. 仔细地；小心地
adj. 小心的；谨慎的；深思熟虑的；审慎的；焦虑的；忧虑的；关切的；挂念的
adj. 关心他人的
n. 私人看护

word_family.mean: n. 照顾；照料；看护；关怀；密切关注；审慎思考；担心；忧虑；收养；监护

examination_example.sentence: Globally, a third of Sumatran cubs in zoos don't make it to adulthood, so I decided to give them round-the-clock <highlight>care</highlight> at home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从全球来看，动物园里三分之一的苏门答腊幼虎无法活到成年，所以我决定在家给它们24小时的照顾。

examination_example.sentence: Marie, if no one takes <highlight>care</highlight> of your children while you're away, Jennifer and I will be glad to have them stay with us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 玛丽，如果你不在的时候没人照顾你的孩子，詹妮弗和我会很高兴让他们和我们住在一起。

examination_example.sentence: Just take <highlight>care</highlight> of yourself and don't worry about the class.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 照顾好自己就好，别担心上课。

examination_example.sentence: Yet, the only one who <highlight>cares</highlight> about any mistake is the one who is speaking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，唯一在乎错误的人是说话的人。

examination_example.sentence: But when you share a story with your friends, you <highlight>care</highlight> a lot more how they react.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是当你和你的朋友分享一个故事时，你会更在乎他们的反应。

examination_example.sentence: They want your eyeballs and don't <highlight>care</highlight> how you're feeling.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们想要吸引你的眼球，不在乎你的感受。

sense_info_list.zh: 小心; 谨慎; 注意

examination_example.sentence: OK, take <highlight>care</highlight>, and see you soon.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 好的，保重，回头见。

examination_example.sentence: Several years ago when my grandparents were well into their 80s, they were no longer able to <highlight>care</highlight> for themselves very well.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几年前，当我的祖父母80多岁的时候，他们已经不能很好地照顾自己了。

examination_example.sentence: Even President Obama's mother-in-law, Marian Robinson, has agreed to leave Chicago and into the White House to help <highlight>care</highlight> for her granddaughters.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就连奥巴马总统的岳母Marian Robinson也同意离开芝加哥进入白宫，帮助照顾她的孙女。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 仔细; 小心; 谨慎

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 医疗护理；医疗照顾；医疗保健
保重；照顾好自己(多用于告别）
个人护理产品；个人护理用品；个人护肤品
医疗卫生工作者；卫生保健工作者；医疗保健人员

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 粗心大意；疏忽；漫不经心
adv. 粗心地；粗心大意地；无忧无虑地
adj. 不小心的；粗心的；无忧无虑的；满不在乎的；随意的；草率的；敷衍的；不感兴趣的；不做努力的
adv. 仔细地；小心地
adj. 小心的；谨慎的；深思熟虑的；审慎的；焦虑的；忧虑的；关切的；挂念的
adj. 无忧无虑的；没有责任的
adj. 关心他人的

word_family.mean: n. 照顾；照料；看护；关怀；密切关注；审慎思考；担心；忧虑；收养；监护

examination_example.sentence: They are full of love and <highlight>care</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们充满了爱和关怀。

examination_example.sentence: It means loving, respecting, obeying (服从), and taking <highlight>care</highlight> of one's parents in their old age.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它意味着爱、尊重、服从和照顾年迈的父母。

examination_example.sentence: Firstly, we should think about the health <highlight>care</highlight> experience as a whole.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首先，我们应该从整体上考虑医疗保健体验。

examination_example.sentence: We must <highlight>care</highlight> about nature and leave it good enough for later generations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们必须关心自然，把它完好地留给后代。

examination_example.sentence: She is also kind because she <highlight>cares</highlight> much about us．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她也很善良，因为她很关心我们。

examination_example.sentence: But she was too excited to <highlight>care</highlight> about the pain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但她太激动了，根本不在意疼痛。

sense_info_list.zh: 仔细; 小心; 谨慎

examination_example.sentence: The "go" light was changed to green and the "take <highlight>care</highlight>" light was changed to white.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “走”灯变为绿色，“小心”灯变为白色。

examination_example.sentence: Yellow warning signs had to be placed beside the roads to remind drivers to take <highlight>care</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 黄色警告标志必须放在道路旁边，提醒司机小心。

examination_example.sentence: A green light was used to mean "take <highlight>care</highlight>" and a white light meant "go".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 绿灯用来表示“小心”，白灯表示“走”。

word_usage.usage:
“关心某人”应说care about sb.，不可遗漏介词about。
示例：有些人对别人漠不关心。
误 Some people do not care others.
正 Some people do not care about others.

care表示“计较”“介意”“在乎”，而care for则表示“照顾”“喜欢”。
示例：I don't care for black coffee.
我不喜欢黑咖啡。
